name: LinkedIn responsive cover teamplate v2
description:
How to make a responsive cover for your LinkedIn profile? 


In fact, this is not a trivial task for a non-designer because you have to remember that your profile cover looks different in different places.


In my opinion, for LinkedIn it is very easy to fix it just by leaving your profile photo always on the left. This will help more users create and download more informative covers. Because nowadays most of them just use stock or abstract images for their covers. For a perfect result, we can keep the proportions of the cover for all states, but this is not necessary.


Btw, how can you handle this right now?

  • First, use top right and top left corners for information that you want to show everywhere: logo, your photo, contacts etc
  • Second, keep in mind that you have two areas that are not always visible: in the center that is overlaid by a photo on the recommendation page and on the left that is overlaid with a photo on the profile page. Just place duplicate information here.
